item.description: Pick your own apples in time for Rosh Hashanah apples and honey. RSVP: David REQUIRED by 9/5 (w/ phone number/e-mail in case date changes due to harvest conditions) MEET: 12:00 noon at the orchard in Peabody, near Route 128. Address and directions will be sent to those who RSVP. COST: $21 for 1/2 bushel, $8.00 for a package (approx. 16 depending on size) + $5 for non-members.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: APPLE PICKING IN PEABODY
